text: The Poodles was a hard rock band from Sweden. ==Discography== ===Albums=== * Metal Will Stand Tall (2006) * Sweet Trade (2007) * Clash of the Elements (2009) * Performocracy (2011) * Tour De Force (2013) * Devil in the Details (2015) * Prisma (2018) ===Singles=== * "Night of Passion" (2006) * "Metal Will Stand Tall" feat. Tess Merkel (2006) * "Song for You" (2006) * "Seven Seas" feat. Peter Stormare (2007) * "Streets of Fire" (2007) * "Line of Fire" feat. E-Type (2008) * "Raise the Banner" (2008) Swedish official song for the Olympic Games in Beijing 2008 * "One Out of Ten" (2009) ==Other websites== * Official web * German The Poodles Fanpage Category:Swedish heavy metal bands
title: The Poodles
